an5.183:0.3: Dwelling at the Root of a Tree
an5.183:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five who dwell at the root of a tree.
an5.183:1.3: One may dwell at the root of a tree because of stupidity … corrupt wishes … madness … because it is praised by the Buddhas … or for the sake of having few wishes …
an5.183:1.4: These are the five who dwell at the root of a tree.”
